North_Little_Rock.Hemingway House (Little Rock, Arkansas): The Hemingway House is a historic house at 1720 Arch Street in Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a 2-1/2 story wood frame structure, with complex massing and exterior typical of the Queen Anne period. A projecting bay on the left has a distinctive array of arched windows on the first floor, and a projecting trio of sash windows set in a bracket-supported surround, with a Palladian window in the gable above.
